amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for Department of Justice Salaries and Expenses by $5 million and increases funding for the Office of Violence Against Women by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Department of Justice salaries and expenses by $5 million and increase funds for the Office of Violence Against Women by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Runyan.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
